changeMessageLabels.description: Modifies the labels on the specified message by adding or removing label IDs.

addLabelIds.description: A list of IDs of labels to add to this message.

id.description: The ID of the message to modify.

removeLabelIds.description: A list of IDs of labels to remove from this message.

changeMessageLabels.title: Change Message Labels

createDraft.description: Creates a new draft with the specified email content.

body.description: The body content of the email.

id.description: The immutable ID of the created draft.

message.description: The message content of the draft.

id.description: The ID of the message.

createDraft.title: Create Draft

createLabel.description: Creates a new label in the user's mailbox.

name.description: The display name of the label to create.

id.description: The immutable ID of the created label.

name.description: The display name of the label.

type.description: The owner type for the label (system or user).

createLabel.title: Create Label

deleteDraft.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified draft. This operation cannot be undone.

id.description: The ID of the draft to delete.

deleteDraft.title: Delete Draft

deleteLabel.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified label. Messages and threads are not deleted, they simply lose this label.

id.description: The ID of the label to delete.

deleteLabel.title: Delete Label

deleteMessage.description: Immediately and permanently deletes the specified message using its ID. This operation cannot be undone. Prefer messages.trash instead

id.description: The ID of the message to delete.

deleteMessage.title: Delete Message

getDraft.description: Gets the specified draft by its ID.

id.description: The ID of the draft to retrieve.
The immutable ID of the draft.

message.description: The message content of the draft.

id.description: The ID of the message.

labelIds.description: List of label IDs applied to the draft message.

snippet.description: A short part of the message text.

getDraft.title: Get Draft

getLabel.description: Gets the specified label by its ID.

id.description: The ID of the label to retrieve.

color.description: The color to assign to the label.

id.description: The immutable ID of the label.

labelListVisibility.description: The visibility of the label in the label list.

messageListVisibility.description: The visibility of messages with this label in the message list.

messagesTotal.description: The total number of messages with the label.

messagesUnread.description: The number of unread messages with the label.

name.description: The display name of the label.

threadsTotal.description: The total number of threads with the label.

threadsUnread.description: The number of unread threads with the label.

type.description: The owner type for the label (system or user).

getLabel.title: Get Label

getMessageAttachment.description: Gets the specified message attachment by its ID.

attachmentId.description: The ID of the attachment to retrieve.

messageId.description: The ID of the message containing the attachment.

attachment.description: The attachment retrieved from the message.

anyOf.description: The immutable ID of the attachment.
The body data of a MIME message part as a base64url encoded string.
The size of the attachment in bytes.

getMessageAttachment.title: Get Message Attachment

getMessageAttachmentFromMail.description: Gets the first attachment from a message by automatically finding the attachment ID from the message.

messageId.description: The ID of the message containing the attachment.

attachment.description: The attachment retrieved from the message.

anyOf.description: The immutable ID of the attachment.
The body data of a MIME message part as a base64url encoded string.
The size of the attachment in bytes.

getMessageAttachmentFromMail.title: Get Message Attachment From Mail

getThread.description: Gets the specified thread by its ID, including all messages in the thread.

id.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve.

historyId.description: The history ID of the thread.

id.description: The unique ID of the thread.

messages.description: The list of messages in the thread.

id.description: The ID of the message.

labelIds.description: List of label IDs applied to this message.

snippet.description: A short part of the message text.

threadId.description: The ID of the thread the message belongs to.

snippet.description: A short part of the message text.

getThread.title: Get Thread

listDrafts.description: Lists all drafts in the user's mailbox.

id.description: The immutable ID of the draft.

message.description: The message content of the draft.

id.description: The ID of the message contained in the draft.

threadId.description: The ID of the thread the draft belongs to.

listDrafts.title: List Drafts

listLabels.description: Lists all labels in the user's mailbox, including system labels and user-created labels.

id.description: The immutable ID of the label.

name.description: The display name of the label.

type.description: The owner type for the label (system or user).

listLabels.title: List Labels

listThreads.description: Lists all email threads in the user's mailbox.

threads.description: List of threads in the mailbox.

historyId.description: The history ID of the thread.

id.description: The unique ID of the thread.

snippet.description: A short part of the message text.

listThreads.title: List Threads

sendDraft.description: Sends the specified draft. The draft will be deleted after being sent.

id.description: The ID of the draft to send.
The ID of the sent message.

labelIds.description: List of label IDs applied to the sent message.

threadId.description: The ID of the thread the message belongs to.

sendDraft.title: Send Draft

trashMessage.description: Moves the specified message to the trash. The message can be restored from the trash using untrashMessage.

id.description: The ID of the message to trash.

trashMessage.title: Trash Message

trashThread.description: Moves the specified thread to the trash. All messages in the thread will be moved to trash. The thread can be restored using untrashThread.

id.description: The ID of the thread to trash.

trashThread.title: Trash Thread

untrashMessage.description: Removes the specified message from the trash and restores it to the inbox.

id.description: The ID of the message to untrash.

untrashMessage.title: Untrash Message

untrashThread.description: Removes the specified thread from the trash. All messages in the thread will be restored.

id.description: The ID of the thread to restore from trash.

untrashThread.title: Untrash Thread

updateDraft.description: Replaces a draft's content with the new email content provided.

body.description: The body content of the email.

id.description: The ID of the draft to update.
The immutable ID of the updated draft.

message.description: The message content of the draft.

id.description: The ID of the message.

updateDraft.title: Update Draft

updateLabel.description: Updates the specified label with new properties like name or color.

backgroundColor.description: The background color as hex string (e.g., #ffffff).

id.description: The ID of the label to update.

name.description: The new display name for the label.

textColor.description: The text color as hex string (e.g., #000000).

color.description: The color assigned to the label.

id.description: The immutable ID of the label.

name.description: The display name of the label.

type.description: The owner type for the label (system or user).

updateLabel.title: Update Label

email.description: The email address of the sender
email.title: Sender email

id.description: The unique identifier of the email thread on Gmail
id.title: Gmail ID

references.description: The contents of the References header field
references.title: References

id.description: The unique identifier of the message on Gmail
id.title: Gmail ID

description: Send, receive, and manage emails directly within your bot's workflow.
name: gmail

lastHistoryId.description: The last history ID processed by the integration

refreshToken.description: The refresh token to use to authenticate with Gmail. It gets exchanged for a bearer token

certificates.description: The certs used by Google for federated sign-on, stringified as JSON

inReplyTo.description: The ID of the message this message is a reply to

title: Gmail

id.description: The email address of the user
id.title: Email address
